channel.title: Blogs on Ogden Studios
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Ogden Studios

item.description: So you volunteered to fix someone’s website, and now you don’t know what the fuck to do. Been there. The thing is, there is always another way to accomplish a goal or task. This is the internet, and if some weird configuration needs to get tried - it has been. So I’m not going to cover every scenario there is. I’m going to limit my scope to the types of solutions I’ve encountered in my work.
